A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.

NOTES:
Right this is a rip of elektri4ka's dvdr he gave me.....THANK YOU !!
I have used lynks audio to sync to this aswell....thanks for that.
Firstly the video source for a TS is great like normally from the russians
The audio is pretty good a bit weak,but certainly heard alot worse....
The problem with lynks release was it was out of sync in few places,not by much except around the 42 min mark it goes
way and there's video footage which as no audio for it .....Not knocking lynks in anyway,personally i think they do really
good releases and he's done most of the hard work getting this 95% synced up...so hats off to him.

WORK DONE:
Well firstly the intro is missing and the audio goes a little at the end so i created a new audio file using the intro and ending off the
original russian audio track mixed with lynks audio inbetween .....
Once i created my audio file i needed to sync it to the video ....now most of it synced pretty easily but theres a part around the 42 min mark
when it goes out like ever 10 secs or less.....i needed to make 17 cuts alone in the part.Also had to remove 10 secs or just under due to no audio for it.
Got to be honest and say i did the best i could be have notice a slight oos in this part.....but it's only a few secs and i ain't going to redo it again for the
sake of that
Now once synced 20 + cuts later it was onto the video .....which was really good but i thought it was a touch too bright and also the rgb colours were
slightly off...i fixed all that and also alter the gamma slightly,chroma slightly,add more contrast and also then used a contour filter.
All in all the release was a bit of a pain to do ....but i'm pretty happy with the outcome.
